title.native: 可愛いだけじゃない式守さん

description:
The ultimate "heartthrob girlfriend" appears! Naturally unlucky high school student Izumi's girlfriend is his classmate Shikimori. She has a beautiful smile and kind personality and always seems happy when she's with Izumi. She's a pretty, cute, and loving girlfriend, but when Izumi's in trouble… she transforms into a super cool "heartthrob girlfriend!" The fun lives of the cute and cool Shikimori, Izumi, and their good friends never end!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: คุณชิกิโมริไม่ได้น่ารักแค่อย่างเดียวนะ
Shikimori Không Chỉ Dễ Thương Thôi Đâu

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Athletics
tags.description: Centers around sporting events that involve competitive running, jumping, throwing, or walking.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Basketball
tags.description: Centers around the sport of basketball.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Football
tags.description: Centers around the sport of football (known in the USA as "soccer").

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

title.native: 可愛いだけじゃない式守さん

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/rato_00)

_Note: Not to be confused by CG Artist [Ryouta Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/236953/Ryouta-Itou) who is affiliated with OLM._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yuki_Nakashim) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nakashima_yuki.official/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/nakashima_yuki/) | [Agency Profile](https://www.beffect.co.jp/talent/yuki/)

A voice actor and the current bassist in the band [Roselia](https://anilist.co/staff/153170/Roselia) as Lisa Imai.

Yuki was born in Wakayama Prefecture and lives in Tokyo. Until middle school she was a junior model for the magazines JS Girls and Sugar Princess Room. She also appeared in different commercials and dramas when she was a child.

She wanted to become a voice actress after seeing Gintama before she entered high school. Yuki was awarded the grand prize together with Takao Kanon in the National Seiyuu Grand Prix held by the seiyuu unit Earth Star Dream in 2014, and as a result she became a member of the unit. She then debuted as a voice actress with the role of Kinako Tanaka in the Teekyuu franchise, as well as starred in the series' stage adaptation.

Yuki was a member of Earth Star Dream until graduating in December 2017, and not long after her graduation the unit got suspended as well. On May 13, 2018, Yuki was then announced as Endou Yurika's replacement as Roselia's bassist and Lisa Imai's voice actor due to Yurika's retirement from the entertainment industry.

(Source: BanG Dream! Wikia)
Kimura Kashiko is an editor working for Mad Box.
**Masayuki Nishide** is a Japanese producer and animation planner, who works for the Asahi Broadcasting Corporation (ABC).

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - My Girlfriend Is Super Cute

Episode 4 - How They Each Feel at the Start of Summer
Episode 5 - Jolly Times at the River!
Episode 6 - With Fireworks Comes Summer's End
